artist: Manufacturer: W. Pontifex, Sons & Wood, London
creditline: Gift of Leo A. and Doris Hodroff
description: ranging from Imperial gallon to half-gill; the two largest with a pair of moulded handles with proof marks from 1856 inscribed County Carlow
markings: on sides of each: [County of Carlow/1826/W. Pontifex & Sons & Wood London]; each inscribed with gallon, half-gallon, etc.; various marks, on rims of each; on foot of each: [1329]
object_name: Half-gill Measure, from a set of seven
title: Half-gill Measure, from a set of seven
